# ðŸŽ¯ Google Launch Verification - Test Plan

## Generated by: Planner Agent
## Date: 2026-02-21
## Target URL: https://www.google.com

---

## Test Objective
Verify that www.google.com launches successfully and the page loads with all expected elements visible.

## Prerequisites
- Browser (Chromium) installed
- Network connectivity available
- Playwright framework configured

## Test Data
- **URL**: https://www.google.com
- **Expected Title**: Contains "Google"
- **Key Elements**: Search input, Google logo, Search buttons

---

## Test Cases

### Test Case 1: [UI] Verify Google Homepage Launches Successfully
**Priority**: High  
**Type**: Smoke Test

#### Steps:
1. **Navigate** to https://www.google.com
2. **Wait** for the page to fully load (domcontentloaded + networkidle)
3. **Verify** the page title contains "Google"
4. **Verify** the URL is https://www.google.com (or regional variant)
5. **Verify** the Google logo/branding is visible on the page
6. **Verify** the search input field is visible and interactable
7. **Verify** at least one search button ("Google Search" or equivalent) is visible

#### Expected Results:
- Page loads without errors within 30 seconds
- Page title contains "Google"
- URL contains "google.com"
- Google logo/branding is visible
- Search input is present and visible
- Search button(s) are present and visible

### Test Case 2: [UI] Verify Google Search Input is Functional
**Priority**: Medium  
**Type**: Functional Test

#### Steps:
1. **Navigate** to https://www.google.com
2. **Click** on the search input field
3. **Type** "Playwright automation" into the search field
4. **Verify** the typed text appears in the search input

#### Expected Results:
- Search input accepts text input
- Typed text is visible in the input field

---

## Assertions Summary
| # | Type | Target | Expected |
|---|------|--------|----------|
| 1 | URL | Page URL | Contains "google.com" |
| 2 | Title | Page Title | Contains "Google" |
| 3 | Visible | Google logo/branding | Is visible on page |
| 4 | Visible | Search input | Is visible and interactable |
| 5 | Visible | Search button | At least one is visible |

## Self-Healing Strategy
- Use flexible selectors (role-based, aria-label, title attributes)
- Use `toContain` instead of exact text match for title/text assertions
- Implement proper wait strategies (domcontentloaded + networkidle)
- Add generous timeouts for navigation (30s) and element visibility (15s)
- Fall back to text-based selectors if role-based ones fail

## Estimated Execution Time
~15 seconds (per test case)

## Teardown
- Close browser context after test completion
